short_summary: TITLE: Privacy Impact Assessment Specialist - Level 2 LOCATION: National Capital Region (NCR), Ottawa, Canada TERM: 1 year (with 2 additional 1-year options) DEADLINE: 2023-09-14
description: This is a competitive bidding process for the provision of Privacy Impact Assessment services at the level of Level 2, as defined in the TBIPS Stream 6 C.16 category. The contract will be awarded to multiple suppliers for a period of one (1) year, with the option to extend for two (2) additional one-year periods. The security clearance required for this project is Enhanced Reliability Status (ERS), and the procurement documents can be found on the Canada Buys website. The contact person for this solicitation is David Repsys, who can be reached at David.Repsys@rcmp-grc.gc.ca

full_summary:
# Tender Notice: Level 2 Privacy Impact Assessment Specialist

## **Request for Proposal (RFP)**

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking to hire a Level 2 Privacy Impact Assessment Specialist through the Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) Supply Arrangement.

### **Job Title**

* English: Level 2 Privacy Impact Assessment Specialist
* French: Spécialiste des évaluations des facteurs relatifs à la vie privée, niveau 2

### **Supply Arrangement (SA)**

The contract will be awarded to a SA Holder who qualified under Tier 1 for services in the National Capital Region (NCR).

### **Job Description**

The successful contractor will provide services to assess and mitigate risks associated with the processing of personal information.

### **Requirements**

* Security Clearance: Enhanced Reliability Status (ERS)
* Services: One (1) named Resource
* Exclusivity: Work is not currently being performed by a contracted resource
* Tender: Singular bid including all relevant information

### **Duration of Contract**

* Initial Contract Period: One (1) year from the contract start date
* Optional Two-Year Extensions: Two (2) additional one-year options, mutually agreed upon by the RCMP and the contractor

### **Security**

Personal information is provided by individuals, and the contractor will have access to documents that may contain sensitive information requiring a high level of security, including Enhanced Reliability Status (ERS) clearance.

### **Submission Information**

To submit an offer, interested parties must be a SA Holder who has been invited to bid by the RCMP.

[Download the RFP Documents](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8372/202304366b---npp-%28en.pdf) (English) or (https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8372/202304366b---npp-%28fr_0.pdf) (French).

### **Clarifications and Inquiries**

Inquiries related to this requirement must be directed to:

David Repsys, Contracting Authority
T: 343-575-5298
E: David.Repsys@rcmp-grc.gc.ca

### **Procurement Process**

A Request for Proposal (RFP) has been issued to qualified Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders. The contract will be awarded based on a competitive selective tendering process.
